lead_paragraph: PISCITELLI--Peter. Ed Koch's Saturday lunch club has lost a great friend and raconteur. Pete was a significant figure in city and state politics for six decades and a devoted colleague to all of us. He will be sorely missed. John LoCicero, George Arzt, Peter Aschkenasy and Arnie Kriss 1/3
